summary: December 3 is the 337th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Morgan Llywelyn  is an American-Irish historical fantasy, historical fiction, and historical non-fiction writer. Her fiction has received several awards and has sold more than 40 million copies, and she herself is recipient of the 1999 Exceptional Celtic Woman of the Year Award from Celtic Women International.
title: Morgan Llywelyn
